ThingDef.label: blood lamp
ThingDef.description: A lamp with specially-treated bulb that produces a red light over a large area. Sanguophages gather around lights like these during their ceremonial meetings. The sanguine glow is particularly pleasing to individuals with the bloodfeeder gene. It runs on electricity and does not produce heat. People need light to move and work at full speed.

ThingDef.label: blood wall lamp
ThingDef.description: A wall-mounted lamp with specially-treated bulb that produces a red light over a large area. It is less powerful than a standing lamp, but can be mounted on walls. The sanguine glow is particularly pleasing to individuals with the bloodfeeder gene. It runs on electricity and does not produce heat.
